summary: Manages a fused function definition by cloning the original function for every combination of fused types, allocating a new local scope, recording the original in the symbol table, and providing a dispatcher that selects the appropriate specialized implementation at call time.
business_intent: Enable Cython to support functions with generic (fused) arguments by automatically generating, registering, and dispatching typeâ€‘specific versions, handling type checks, buffer handling, and defaults so that Python code invokes the most efficient C implementation.
